title: Someone who played trash why should not me call them trash?
body: Everyone has the experience that some of the teammates played trash and feeding all time. Told them to play safe and they never listen to it. So in this situation they are playing like they are trash so why I can't call them trash? They ruined my game experience so I can't so some trash talk? They make me lose the game and I can't abuse them? Even I try to report them and they never get banned.
